## RmmReceipt type

One of either a [PendingReceipt](./rmm-ethers.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, a [FailedReceipt](./rmm-ethers.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./rmm-ethers.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RmmReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = PendingReceipt | MinedReceipt<R, D>;
```
<b>References:</b> [PendingReceipt](./rmm-ethers.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [MinedReceipt](./rmm-ethers.minedreceipt.md)
